title: Viktor takes enemy blue.
body: I have no words for this... Some people

replies.body: Man. I really hope he was just clowning around...

> [{quoted}](name=Twiggles,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PpiUTE4g,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-28T23:16:32.567+0000)
>
> Man. I really hope he was just clowning around...

bad joke man

not a bad joke

itsa dad joke*
shaco isnt a clown he's a joker
he is a jester
And Shaco players wonder why people don't like them.

Stealth is typically a dirty mechanic.  Lots of hate go out to Twitch, Teemo, Vayne, and Evelynn for their stealth mechanics.

Shaco is a melee hyper carry (or, well, hyper assassin that is technically a carry).  As with all AD carries, Shaco is greedy for your farm, camps, and kills.  Shaco is a pretty hard champion to get going without ambushing the enemy jungler and getting first blood at his Blue/Red.  And once he gets going, though, it is exactly like dealing with a second Riven or Vayne main in the game.  He will take everything and be an asshole to the other nine players if you object.

not true at all. You have no idea what a Shaco playing ass hole is like until you get an AP shaco who knows what he is doing. Now THAT is someone who will be an ass hole to everyone. Always steals your kills with a backstab E (Is it still a KS if he is stealing it from 90% of the enemies health?), if shit goes down he always leaves you to fend for yourself, and he will run through the enemy team and escape at least once because why not?

How to play Shaco 101:

"Welp team, good luck fighting 4v5. I'll be over here"

4v6*

it's shaco after all
You're right, my bad.

That's not true of all of us :/
meh, i play shaco often so you could call me one but when i do go shaco i just make jokes and puns for both teams all game and make the enemy team like my jokes but hate shaco at the same time

^Downvoted for puns 

http://imgur.com/ER6k4XV
I will pun-ish you for that q-q
It would be interesting if these could stack. It would put quite a bit more interest on early game invades. Which I don't like so rito plz no
I think it would be interesting but overpowered. They could add benefits and detriments. Like, double reds would tick down your health when not in combat and double blue would slow you
That would just punish you for killing the enemy jungler while you both have your buffs.
idk, just ideas

I had a similar thing happen with an Irelia and I was Twisted Fate. She was clearing out the enemy's harpies and since I was oom I was using my blue card and last hitting to get back some mana and she yelled at me for doing so. I was just like this isn't even our jungle camps so why so mad. And then she got into a 1v4 and while I was running to help but pathfinding was being annoying she died, yelled at me and disconnected. Somehow we did better after she left

Don't steal farm, especially from a jungler. Blue card a minion or a turret if you need mana. The fact that it was "the enemy's jungle" doesn't make it any less rude to watch someone farm and then last-hit and take the gold. What the hell, man?

Honestly, for counterjungling, I've always felt that clear speed >>> farm efficiency (ergo TF clearing away the wraiths makes the counterjungling go faster), even if the difference is only half a second. But then again, I'm not a jungler. xD

Hell, TF gets a lot more gold value out of the minis due to his passive anyway.  In the case of such low value items, let the guy who can nearly double the worth get it.  More gold for the team as a whole is always better.
except it sorta sets you behind as a jungler.

I'd agree normally, but the mini-raptors are worth 5 gold a pop.  I'd be willing to give up 15 gold to get a teammate 30.  Just like when I'm a laner working on Scuttle or stealing from the enemy jungler, and my own walks by, and I'd give it to them due to their machete bonus, if a TF comes by and can get his 1-6 gold bonus on each of the minis I'd let him.     Maybe it comes from being Plat, but I will do anything to put my team ahead, not just myself ahead.

Last-hitting hardly improves clear times. If he actually helped clear, that would be different. I don't think there's ever a time when watching someone do the work to kill something and then stepping in to last hit it when it's not even contentious at all isn't rude.

The issue is, your jungle is taking their camps to get a farm advantage by taking something and removing it from the enemies clear, but if you get none of the gold from the camp you are now actually putting yourself behind by walking into their jungle to invade. In other words, if your laner gets the gold instead of you they are putting you at a gold disadvantage against the enemy jungler.

You are a terrible jungler if you dont give blue to your vic after you just stole enemy blue. Like, what the hell man, be a team player.

> [{quoted}](name=BioticBrony,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PpiUTE4g,comment-id=000400020000,timestamp=2015-08-30T20:44:09.731+0000)

Same

yes he's dumb for thinkg it stacked but, if he's at their blue already taking it and u stal it, your a fucking dick, now he's forced to go around and back to his own blue, probably oom because he was expecting to get blue the first time, probably lost some health..

just dont steal from junglers unless they offer.

This shaco clearly had no interest in giving his midlaner blue at all, and probably would have stolen their blue from viktor as well and wasted it, considering he thinks they stack. 

So it makes sense for Viktor to take one of the blues so it's not wasted.

Edit: The only way this was a dick move, is if it was the start of the game, and they were stealing the enemy blue and viktor took the first buff.
He had full health and everything. We were all recalling from a fight we just had anyways he could handle walking to the blue buff.
did he mean he was going to get level 2?
This was rather late game.
This is cringe worthy.....
For some reason I read that in a batman and joker voice...Shaco was Batman
LOL. The /all chat mockery at the end was a necessary evil.

Was it a contest to see who's the stupidest? I see no clear winner here. They both take first place. Congratulations.

"I have no words for this... Some people"----- are bad at the game, some people don't know how to play the game, some people don't know how basic game mechanics work, some people are assholes, some people are plain dumb.
